name: Mothercore
description:
Calling all agents! Your job is to protect the Mothercore from the inter-dimensional forces of the E.Y.E army! Use the towers you collect to build up defenses. Use traps to stop enemies in their tracks and use the Mothercore Blasts to dominate the battlefield! Research new tools for your arsenal of protection!


-STORY MODE-


Follow the story and complete the missions assigned to unlock more missions, towers, traps, and blasts! Fight the final boss and protect the Mothercore!

-ARCADE MODE-


Earn points in an endless mode with an infinite amount of enemies and try to earn the greatest Highscore! Use those points create new Towers, Traps and Blasts. Lets see how far you get...
